name: Brewitched (Dusty-EmilSvensson)
description:
"Chaotic party game where two players work together to brew magical ingredients into fantastic concoctions and serve the impatient customers before the time is up." That's the premis of this fastpased brewing game inspired by the popular game Overcooked! 

Play as 2 wizard/witch students that are learning all about how to brew magical potions from their incompetent teacher. All the while their teacher tries to build herself an potion brewing empire on your free labor.

This game is intended to be played with controlers for up to 2 players, but playing the game on keyboard is also possible.

This game was made at The Game Assembly Malmö in Sweden by ShroomBirds, our game dev team. this is our last project together before we leave for our internships at real game companies. 

This game is our baby and we will love it forever <3
